summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Audience Quality Engine v1.0. All Phase 1.2 features working correctly including proxy-based computation, admin configuration, and Twitter Score integration. Formula validation confirms proper audience quality assessment.

minor_issues.issue: Data sources list doesn't include 'audience_quality' even when audience_quality_score_0_1 is provided

passed_tests: GET /api/connections/audience-quality/mock - examples with different quality levels
POST /api/connections/audience-quality - compute with overlap and red_flags
Twitter Score Integration - audience_quality_score_0_1 replaces network_proxy
Formula validation: high overlap + red_flags = low purity = low audience_quality
Formula validation: low overlap + no red_flags = high purity = high audience_quality
Configuration management - weights sum validation, thresholds, and red flag management
